messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Check that the link text combined with programmatically determined link context identifies the purpose of the link.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Check that the content is ordered in a meaningful sequence when linearised, such as when style sheets are disabled.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Where instructions are provided for understanding the content, do not rely on sensory characteristics alone (such as shape, size or location) to describe objects.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Check that any information conveyed using colour alone is also available in text, or through other visual cues.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: If any part of the content moves, scrolls or blinks for more than 5 seconds, or auto-updates, check that there is a mechanism available to pause, stop, or hide the content.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Check that no component of the content flashes more than three times in any 1-second period, or that the size of any flashing area is sufficiently small.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Ensure that any common navigation elements can be bypassed; for instance, by use of skip links, header elements, or ARIA landmark roles.
